name: To The Top!
description:
"A roguelike with inspiration from our favorite foddian games"

Foddian Game for the Ludwig Game Jam

No two playthroughs will ever be the same!

Random rooms will generate random checkpoints that determine which power will be used in the next room

Try to climb up as many rooms as possible!

Controls:

"A"/"D" to move or point

"space" to flip or charge jump

Use the title room to test any players you would like!

Good luck, and may RNG be on your side!


Note: we've had issues with web build performance on past web builds for games in godot, so if you're having issues with input lag, please try the native download
